long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of." - Bruce Lee

meid eprac is a sleek and minimalist new tab customization which aims to be the best friend that slaps you in the face and tells you to get your life together. 
The lifespan calendar includes a nifty habit tracker which can be used to keep track of your progress in building habits.
It is uncomfortable to think of death but being aware of it will push you to value each day more. So, remember, you are going to die, so live, NOW.

Features:
- Lifespan calendar which estimates your date of death given an 80 year life
- Habit tracker which allows you to add habits and keep track of how well you're doing at building them
- Date, time and temperature of your current location displayed nicely
- Basic settings section for some minor tweaks
- Minimalist and simple design so your focus can be on what is important

If you have any longer questions or concerns send an email to: khvincentchee@gmail.com.
